alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 7:53AM CST until March 04 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River near Watts affecting Delaware and Adair Counties. Illinois River near Tahlequah affecting Cherokee County. Illinois River at Chewey affecting Cherokee, Delaware and Adair Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River near Watts. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, minor flooding occurs from the Arkansas border to near Fidler`s Bend. Extreme turbulence makes the river unsafe for floating. At 15.0 feet, minor flooding occurs from the Arkansas border to near Fidler`s Bend. Permanent campgrounds are affected. Extreme turbulence makes the river unsafe for floating. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 7.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 14.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
